name: Seeder (SnowyCocoon, AdrianNowak97)
description:
Play in the browser using only mouse!

The year is 2147, and Earth, which was once a beautiful planet, now stands abandoned, known as the "dustbin of space." However, not all hope has been lost. Rebuild planet earth as one of the ancient Slavic druids awakened by mother nature and plant beautiful trees of life in various places around the world to restore our planet to its former glory! But beware, there are monsters lurking around you that have been created by mutating garbage and animals that want to stop you at all costs, and take over the world completely. Can you handle this mission and help mother nature restore the Earth to its former charm?

Version 2.0 of the "Seeder" game. The 1.0 version was created on the game jam (link: Seeder (Game jam edition) by SnowyCocoon, AdrianNowak97, Shroomate (itch.io))
